amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, by $25 million and increases funding for Defense Health Programs by a similar amount in order to address traumatic brain injury.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, by $25 million and increase funding for Defense Health Program (traumatic brain injury) by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pascrell amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pascrell amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Pascrell.
